channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ko-fi Button
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ko-fi Button

item.title: CVE-2023-2254|2023-08-16T11:03:29.573Z -- unknown -- ko-fi%20button
item.description: The Ko-fi Button WordPress plugin before 1.3.3 does not properly some of its settings, which could allow high-privilege users to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup), and we consider it a low risk.
